title: Request for DateTime information for DE Api

comments.author: DarkSpirit.7046
comments.body:
If we have the datetime information as to when the events were last successful, we would be able to find out the status (i.e. contested or not) of the Orr temples?

If not, then I suppose someone can setup a daemon to ping those events over time. Hope that doesnâ€™t cost too much network traffic for the servers.
